But just as a point of clarification, we're likely not going go super moderation on a post-by-post basis, it's more if someone/something reaches a threshold where we (admins) feel we need to step in and start having discussions about someone, that actions will be taken. I'll go ahead and say it's the pornography ruling of you know it when you see it.
